title: Play Your Game
description: Imagine if there were secrets that could make you a Superstar in soccer. Now picture using these same secrets again and again, to become a Superstar in all aspects of your life. You probably donâ€™t believe there are secrets. The truth is that these secrets are not so secret, because all adults know them, but never teach them to children. Imagine if you knew these secrets as a child, how different your life will be now. You have the secrets in your hands, because the Game of Soccer mirrors the Game of Life. Do you want to leave your mark? Do you want to become a superstar? Then Play Your Game! Just like in life, there is you the player, your purpose and obstacles that can either hinder or move you forward. You cannot control every aspect of your environment. All you can control is how you play your game.
author: Chima Obinna
